body_html: I found the root cause. my input data vectors are modeled differently across each execution due to some issue in the data modeling part. Otherwise, no issue in tensor flow graph after restoration found. After fixing the input data model, I could able to retrain from the last checkpoint properly. I suggest cross checking the input data model for its consistency across multiple executions

body: I found the root cause. my input data vectors are modeled differently across each execution due to some issue in the data modeling part. Otherwise, no issue in tensor flow graph after restoration found. After fixing the input data model, I could able to retrain from the last checkpoint properly. I suggest cross checking the input data model for its consistency across multiple executions
